markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Eldritch Archer Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6323) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 199 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Eldritch Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=249)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Eldritch Archer Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6318)

</column>

---

You learn additional eldritch archer magic. You gain the [expert spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132).

<title level="2">Expert Eldritch Archer Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Eldritch Archer Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6327)
name: Expert Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
